full_summary:
# **Government Tender Announcement:**
### Project Information:

*   **Project Title (English)**: Accommodations for DND Personnel in Timmins, ON
*   **Project Title (French)**: Hébergement du personnel du MDN à Timmins, ON
*   **Tender Reference Number (English)**: WS3831973692
*   **Tender Reference Number (French)**: RE-WS3831973692
*   **Amendment Number (English)**: 0
*   **Amendment Number (French)**: 0

### Project Overview:

The Canadian government intends to award a contract for accommodation services for up to 55 personnel of the Department of National Defence in Timmins, Ontario. The contractor will provide a facility with a minimum of 35 rooms for 5-6 nights' accommodation from February 4th to 10th, 2023.

### Key Project Details:

*   **Closing Date and Time (EST)**: 2023-01-26, 14:00:00
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 4th, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: February 10th, 2023
*   **Tender Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

### Evaluation and Award Process:

*   The procurement will be carried out through an open bidding process.
*   The contract will be awarded to the vendor offering the lowest price that meets all the requirements stated in the Statement of Work.

### Contact Information:

*   **Contact Person**: Andrew Denbeigh
*   **Contact Email**: [andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:andrew.denbeigh@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15156388?extsite=MTUxNTYzODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15156388?extsite=MTUxNTYzODhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) |
